net.datenwerke.dtoservices.dtogenerator.annotations

Annotation Type ExposeToClient


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface ExposeToClient

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean allowArbitraryLobSize
      Very large objects might compromise the application (dos).
      boolean allowForeignPosoForEnclosed
      Allows an existing enclosed poso to be "moved".
      boolean disableHtmlEncode
      String values are encoded using StringEscapeUtils htmlEncode.
      boolean displayTitle
      If true, the property's content will be used as display title.
      boolean enableSimpleHtmlPolicy 
      boolean exposeValueToClient
      Defines if the server value is copied to the client on dto generation
      boolean id
      Defines if this field acts as id for this poso.
      boolean inheritDtoView
      Uses the "here" view for the generation of a subentity (as for EnclosedEntities)
      boolean key
      Defines if this field acts as key for this poso.
      boolean mergeDtoValueBack
      Allows to disable merging of a certain property when merging dto and poso.
      PropertyValidator validateDtoProperty
      Returns an array containing validators for a specific property
      DtoView view
      The minimal view this property belongs to.
      Visibility visibility 

    • Element Detail

      • id

        public abstract boolean id
        Defines if this field acts as id for this poso.
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • key

        public abstract boolean key
        Defines if this field acts as key for this poso.
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • view

        public abstract DtoView view
        The minimal view this property belongs to.
        Returns:
        Default:
        net.datenwerke.gxtdto.client.dtomanager.DtoView.NORMAL

      • exposeValueToClient

        public abstract boolean exposeValueToClient
        Defines if the server value is copied to the client on dto generation
        Returns:
        Default:
        true

      • disableHtmlEncode

        public abstract boolean disableHtmlEncode
        String values are encoded using StringEscapeUtils htmlEncode. By setting this to true, no encoding will be performed.
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • enableSimpleHtmlPolicy

        public abstract boolean enableSimpleHtmlPolicy
        Default:
        false

      • allowArbitraryLobSize

        public abstract boolean allowArbitraryLobSize
        Very large objects might compromise the application (dos). Strings are per default cut off at 8192 characters. To circumvent this, set this option.
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • mergeDtoValueBack

        public abstract boolean mergeDtoValueBack
        Allows to disable merging of a certain property when merging dto and poso.
        Returns:
        Default:
        true

      • displayTitle

        public abstract boolean displayTitle
        If true, the property's content will be used as display title.
        See Also:
        GenerateDto.displayTitle()
        Default:
        false

      • validateDtoProperty

        public abstract PropertyValidator validateDtoProperty
        Returns an array containing validators for a specific property
        Returns:
        Default:
        @net.datenwerke.dtoservices.dtogenerator.annotations.PropertyValidator(bypass=true)

      • allowForeignPosoForEnclosed

        public abstract boolean allowForeignPosoForEnclosed
        Allows an existing enclosed poso to be "moved".
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • visibility

        public abstract Visibility visibility
        Default:
        net.datenwerke.dtoservices.dtogenerator.Visibility.PRIVATE

      • inheritDtoView

        public abstract boolean inheritDtoView
        Uses the "here" view for the generation of a subentity (as for EnclosedEntities)
        Returns:
        Default:
        false
